section.heading: Disposition of assets on dissolution.
section.text: If the Agency is dissolved by repeal of this chapter, or ceases to exist for any other reason, all of its assets (including, but not limited to, cash, accounts receivable, reserve funds, real or personal property, and contract and other rights) shall automatically be assigned to and become the property of the District.

annotations.annotation: as added Aug. 5, 1981, D.C. Law 4-28, § 2(w), 28 DCR 2848
